definition: to return a favor/to reciprocate/(literary) to report back
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else

sentences.english: For thou shalt heap hot coals upon his head, and the Lord will reward thee.
sentences.chinese: 這是將火炭堆在他頭上，上主也必要因此還報你。
